Welcome to HyMinions!


UPDATE

Hello visitors! Hope you have enjoyed my minion calculator. I have made some updates to the website.

  • NEW events page with new events added
  • new abouts and contact me page
  • numerous bugs fixed

If you spot a bug, feel free to contact me.


HELP WANTED

I have been doing some research on minion storages. I would like to know how to calculate when a minion would completely fill out, so that I can make a more advanced minion calculator.

If your minions are full, you could help me out by screen capture the minion GUI (with the minion storages) and upload to this google form.

Alternatively, if you have any insights on the calculation, you could reply to my forum post.

Thank you very much!
